content.explanation:
Welcome to the world of functions! Functions are everywhere in your daily life, even if you don't realize it.

Think about your smartphone: when you tap an app icon, your phone always opens that specific app. When you press the volume up button, the volume increases. Each action (input) produces a predictable result (output).

This predictable relationship between inputs and outputs is what we call a function in mathematics.
